thread.title: 2016 Colorado New Play Summit set with readings by four playwrights

title: 2016 Colorado New Play Summit set with readings by four playwrights
text:
Published By: Denver Post - Today 
The Theatre Company at the DCPA today announced the four playwrights for the 2016 Colorado New Play Summit....
